Bayesian Statistics for Data Analysis

Professor

  • Minwoo Chae (POSTECH)

Grade

  • Audit

Course Information

  • This course will introduce elementary Bayesian inference and computational methods for data analysis.

Schedule

  • Bayesian paradigm
  • Conjugate priors
  • Markov chain Monte Carlo
  • Hierarchical models
  • Mixture models
  • Variational inference
  • Regression models
  • Model checking and comparison
  • Gaussian processes
  • Dirichlet processes
